list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a continuous area or expanse which is free, available, or unoccupied.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a table took up much of the space
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một cái bàn chiếm nhiều không gian

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the dimensions of height, depth, and width within which all things exist and move.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the work gives the sense of a journey in space and time
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công việc mang lại cảm giác về một hành trình trong không gian và thời gian

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an interval of time (often used to suggest that the time is short considering what has happened or been achieved in it).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: both their cars were stolen in the space of three days
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cả hai chiếc xe của họ bị đánh cắp trong không gian ba ngày

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the portion of a text or document available or needed to write about a subject.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there is no space to give further details
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không có không gian để cung cấp thêm chi tiết

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the freedom and scope to live, think, and develop in a way that suits one.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a teenager needing her own space
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một thiếu niên cần không gian của riêng mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: one of two possible states of a signal in certain systems.
position (two or more items) at a distance from one another.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the poles are spaced 3 feet apart
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các cực được cách nhau 3 feet
